title: booster
description: Boosters are one of the key positions in our business. The better your work, the more orders you will receive. Responsibility, professionalism and motivation are what describe the ideal candidate for this position. If you think that this describes you, then we look forward to your application.
advantages: Automated system for receiving an order in two easy clicks.
Crediting funds for a completed order to your currency account
Several withdrawal methods - VISA (cross-borders), WMZ, PayPal, Bank-transfer, QIWI, USDT

title: Sell Currency To Us
description: Sell any amount of currency in Dragonflight, WotLK, FFXIV, Path Of Exile, and more. Stable payouts.
advantages: Payments to any country in the world without restrictions
There are many available payout methods - WMZ, VISA (cross-borders), PayPal

title: Currency Seller
description: Sell currency yourself. FullBoosts is one of the largest in-game currency marketplaces with a huge number of regular customers.
advantages: Sell currency directly to the client on website
Payments to any country in the world without restrictions
The ability to order an accelerated withdrawal (1 working day)
There are many available payout methods - WMZ,VISA (cross-borders), PayPal
